overview:
Frapple.com is an offline to internet keyword link system. URL’s, especially deep linked ones, make for lousy print … a keyword can be linked to any URL or email address. Keyword links have unlimited applications on product packaging, installation instructions, advertisements, or even shelf tags. My business card simply has www.frapple.com and BAZ printed on it. BAZ is my personal frapple keyword link … always has up to date contact info, and best of all, the info and email addresses can’t be harvested for spam.

The uniqueness of frapple, is the keyword input can be enabled on any website …makes instructions easy, at our website.com enter the keyword link “whatever” to get additional information on “anything.”

Newspapers could benefit by directing readers to enter keyword links at THEIR website for on-line updates … no wonder they are in such dire condition! I’ve told more than one publisher “Link or die.” “This internet thingy is not just a passing fad.”
